snippet.title: Flipon - Trailer (Nintendo Switch/PC/iOS/Android)
snippet.description:
Join Kat and her crew in an epic quest in Flipon, a juicy, fun and nervous action puzzle game!

Flipon is a juicy and fun action puzzle game full of surprises!
Mine flipoblocks by aligning them to make combos, solve puzzles and defeat the (cute) bad guys.

More info at https://www.flipon.net/
- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1285020/Flipon/
- eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/flipon-switch/
- iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/flipon/id1535461342
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pid.flipon


Have fun!
